basicAttack.name: Half Truths
basicAttack.basicAttack: Aalto fires up to 5 consecutive shots, dealing Aero DMG. Basic Attack 4 will spread the "Mist" forward, which lasts for 1.5s.
basicAttack.heavyAttack: Aalto enters the aiming state for a more powerful shot. The aimed shot fired after charging finishes deals Aero DMG.
basicAttack.midairAttack: Aalto consumes STA to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Aero DMG.
basicAttack.dodgeCounter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Mist Avatar
skills.description: Casts "Mist" and 1 "Mist Avatar(s)" to taunt the surrounding targets. The avatars inherit a portion of Aalto's HP and generate 6 Mist Bullets around them, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Mist Bullets
skills.description: Deals Aero DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage.

resonanceLiberation.name: Flower in the Mist
resonanceLiberation.description: Generate a "Gate of Quandary" in front, dealing Aero DMG. When bullets pass trough the "Gate of Quandary", they deal increased DMG. "Gate of Quandary" lasts for 10s.

skills.name: Mistcloak Dash
skills.description: Movement speed increased; During this period, "Mist Drops" are continuously consumed, and for each 1 "Mist Drop" consumed, 1 Mist Bullet(s) is generated.

skills.name: Mist Drops
skills.description: Aalto can hold up to 6 "Mist Drops". When Basic Attack or Mid-air Attack passes through "Mist" and hits the target, 1 "Mist Drop" is recovered.

skills.name: Perfect Performance
skills.description: Aalto's Heavy Attack will always critically hit, triggered once every 30s.

skills.name: Mid-game Break
skills.description: Aalto will continuously recover Stamina when he is in the Forte Circuit Mistcloak Dash state.

introSkill.name: Feint Shot
introSkill.description: Aalto shows up out of thin air to perform rapid continuous shooting, dealing Aero DMG.

outroSkill.name: Dissolving Mist
outroSkill.description: The incoming Resonator has their Aero DMG Amplified by 23% for 14s or until they are switched out.

waveband.name: Trickster's Opening Show
waveband.description: The cooldown of Resonance Skill Shift Trick is reduced by 4s.

waveband.name: Mistweaver's Debut
waveband.description: "Mist Avatar" inherits 100% more HP from Aalto. When Aalto attacks targets taunted by the "Mist Avatar(s)", his ATK is increased by 15%.

waveband.name: Hazey Transition
waveband.description: When Aalto's Basic Attack or Mid-air Attack passes through the "Gate of Quandary", 2 more bullets will be generated, dealing 50% of the DMG of Basic Attack or Mid-air Attack.

waveband.name: Blake Bloom for Finale
waveband.description: The damage of Resonance Skill Mist Bullets is increased by 30%; Aalto receives 30% less damage in his Forte Circuit Mistcloak Dash state.

waveband.name: Applause of the Lost
waveband.description: In the Forte Circuit Mistcloak Dash state, Aalto's Aero DMG Bonus is increased by 25% for 6s.

waveband.name: Broker's Secrets
waveband.description: Resonance Liberation Flower in the Mist now additionally increases Crit. Rate by 8%. When Aalto's Heavy Attack passes through the "Gate of Quandary", the damage dealt is additionally increased by 50%.
